rev.desc.rev.desc: set readonly flag in panels:
rinit.cache
rinit.events
rinit.options
rinit.screen
update panel add.option, change error exit to next
There appears to be a maximum of 100 allowable display options for a form
update panel add.wfPhase.options.1, consider the special add operation
QCCR1E126148, [Performance Defect] Performance enhancement on calculating the PD Workflow actions
Modified panel setup.sort.fields and sort.view to parse groupby fields when set sort
use setvariables and getvariables to avoid too many parse/evaluate call which cause performance issue.
The icon for apply template in Incident Management is missing.

RTE changes the panel rio's behavior to handle the PD Action/Manual Transition's localized text and image issue, the option's description of the rio parameter will use the fomat like @@$$msgClassName@@&&msgNumber@@&&originalButtonName, in wich the "@@$$" is the prefix and the "@@&&" is the separator.
update panel add.wfPhase.options.1, rollback QCCR1E107325
fix the issue that the file level action does not localized
fix the issue if display form is not configured, error ocurrs while switch between alternative form and display form.
support conditional display form
Rollback changes of 109216
producttype qbe ignores usergrid settings from withing a interaction fill.
Change panel:
display:
add statement:
if (type($L.dd.format)=6) then ($L.dd.format.save=name in $L.dd.format)
panel: display.decide
Change from:
type($L.dd.format)=2 and not (null($L.filed)) and (gui() and $QBE)
To:
(type($L.dd.format)=2 or type($L.dd.format)=6) and not (null($L.filed)) and (gui() and $QBE)
After custom sort and then refresh the page list, the sort will not take effective
panel sort.view
add code
if ($L.dd.view.sort.type=0) then
$L.dd.sort.type ="a"
else
$L.dd.sort.type ="d"
panel setup.sort.fields, add code
$L.dd.sort=$L.field.list
$L.dd.view.sort.type=$sort.order
if (null($sort.order) or $sort.order=0) then
$L.dd.sort.type ="a"
else
$L.dd.sort.type ="d"
90568 and 90567, to support the cross table fileds and user option in conditiion editor.
Parent change is locked even if "Lock Parent record" is unchecked in Object file
add to support parameter $L.ignore.wfPhase to ingore the wfPhase related options/actions/formats.
panel: display
add qbe.format support. user can put the value in displayscreen.
Panel/add.wfPhase.actions.1
add actionMsgId>10000 means the action is from workflow and resolve $L.ds.a.options issue
recompile to avoid us.resort.column parameter issue
Modified panel=sort to pass in the groups used in rad=us.resort.column

QC Ref. QCRQ1E65843: Task4: Move the RAD applications modified by the PD team from Perforce to SVN QC Ref. QCCR69479 - Alternate forms not working.QC Ref. QCCR69653 - [Additional Forms] Not able to edit a saved condition in additional form for a WorkflowModifications do display application so that transitions will use $L.tableAccess.update as part of the condition of a transition if the file uses the new security model. Panel: add.wfPhase.forms.1Change: Changed the following expressions from: $L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond=evaluate(nullsub(5 in $L.wfi in altForm in $L.wfPhase, true)) if ($L.format=2 in $L.wfi in altForm in $L.wfPhase) then ($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond=true;2 in $L.wfi in altForm in $L.wfPhase=displayForm in $L.wfPhase;$L.ds.idx in $L.ds.desc=scmsg(6, "workflow")+">"+scmsg(7, "workflow")) $L.temp="$L.messages=insert($L.messages,0,1,\"altForm:"+2 in $L.wfi in altForm in $L.wfPhase+"\")" To: $L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond=evaluate(nullsub(parse(str(5 in $L.wfi in altForm in $L.wfPhase), 2), true)) if ($L.format=2 in $L.wfi in altForm in $L.wfPhase) then ($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond=true;$L.useForm=displayForm in $L.wfPhase;$L.ds.idx in $L.ds.desc=scmsg(6, "workflow")+">"+scmsg(7, "workflow")) $L.temp="$L.messages=insert($L.messages,0,1,\"altForm:"+$L.useForm+"\")" Added the following expression: $L.useForm=2 in $L.wfi in altForm in $L.wfPhase Panel: add.wfPhase.options.1Change: Changed the following expression from: if ($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond="true") then ($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond=true) To: if ($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond="true") then if (filename($L.env)="tableAccess") then ($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond=nullsub(evaluate($L.tableAccess.update), false)) else ($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond=true)
Removed
evaluate(time in $L.screen)
at time limit on fdisp panel
Improve performance and maintainability of RAD application display by removing code that supports text mode.
Added an evaluate() around $L.modify on display.go, so that a conditional string would be evaluated as true or false.
Added check to ensure that an action or transition is not given a NULL value if the scmessage record has the message removed (but the record is not deleted)
Pick up the localized label for options/actions/forms from Workflow Phases
decision to get actions was mistakenly based on autoTransition length instead of action length.
Added Alternate form Functionality
Story: 26536 - Enhanced Application Framework (EAF)
45871 - merge EAF code to Henry branch
Task: 46242 - DEV: load in eafDocEngine unload
Panel: select.options.from.cache
Changed exit from: check.text
To: check.wfPhase
Panel: next
Changed exit from: check.text
To: check.wfPhase
Added the following panels:
add.wfPhase.actions
add.wfPhase.actions.1
add.wfPhase.options
add.wfPhase.options.1
check.wfPhase
check.wfPhase.action.done
check.wfPhase.done
DE2955 - modifications to make sure that the default 3 (back) option does not override an existing 3 option
CP SCR 40724
added reference to parameters 11-20 on the call.rad panel
Grouping is now kept if it comes from a view (during sorting).
Removed call to obsolete function current.scroll()
Modified to pass in the inbox to us.get.qbe.format. Part of Rally Task TA228
Added support for xml fills
Added debug info for local variables passed into the app.
CP SCR3887
panel: co
added the following expression after the while loop:
$L.action=nullsub(1 in $L.ds.idx in $L.ds.actions, "NULL")
This gets the actual action that was called so that it can be checked on the 'check.option.1' panel.
panel: check.option.1
added 2 new exits:
custom.sort.traverse (condition: $L.action="customsort" and $L.dd.reclist>0)
custom.sort ($L.action="customsort")
Both of these panels call the 'create.custom.sort.list' application...one is for when record list is enabled and the other for when it's not.
Fixed an issue that caused parent locks to not be cleaned up when taking the reselect exit from the se.lock.object panel.
Modified $L.search.condition flag to only be true if the "search.only" field on the displayscreen is set to true.
Moved position of $L.file=$FILED to start panel.
Added $L.search.condition flag.
Removed calls to current.scroll()
Changed display application on add.user.options panel so that the 4th line is as follows:
$L.opt.desc.id=val(11 in $L.x in add.options in $L.fc, 1);$L.opt.desc.msg=scmsg($L.opt.desc.id, "fc");$L.ins in $L.user.desc=nullsub($L.opt.desc.msg, 3 in $L.x in add.options in $L.fc)
Panel: add.option
changed the following line:
$L.ds.insert=not null($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.opt) and $L.ds.idx in $L.ds.opt>$L.ds.option
to
$L.ds.insert=not null($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.opt)
This way the insert flag will always be set to true if the option is not null. If the option is NULL then the new option will simply be tagged onto the end of the array.
Modification to default $L.modify before evaluating conditions. Change made on display.go pane.
Moved some panels into subroutines due to application size.
Modifcation for 12254, always needs to add the option if the engine flag is true, even if getting the cached options.
devtx BUG12254:
modified the check.text panel. modified the condition for the rinit.events exit to:
$L.gui and filename($L.options)="displayoption"
changed the exit for the rinit.events panel to 'decide.from.cache'.
Added the decide.from.cache panel
added the select.default.event panel
'display.go' panel
Changed the expression:
$L.io.cond.flag=evaluate(io in $L.screen)
to
$L.io.cond.flag=nullsub($L.modify, evaluate(io in $L.screen))
add.option panel (this builds the arrays of javascript expressions):
$L.ds.idx in $L.ds.javascript.pre=javascript.pre in $L.options
$L.ds.idx in $L.ds.javascript.post=javascript.post in $L.options
process.option panel (this processes the pre javascript expressions):
if (not null($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.javascript.pre)) then js($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.javascript.pre)
get.action panel (this processes the post javascript expressions):
if (not null($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.javascript.post)) then js($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.javascript.post)
updated the prep.screen process panel to process any javascript defined in the displayscreen record.
Locking issue
added following expressions to the set.reselect panel:
$L.locked=true;$L.messages=insert($L.messages, 1, 1, "locked")
if (not null($L.parent.file)) then ($L.messages=insert($L.messages, 1, 1, strings in $L.parent.file);$L.messages=insert($L.messages, 1, 1, "parentlocks"))
$L.mode="update"
Will now pass sort order back in messages.
Modified the show.rio panel to use $L.io.cond.flag for the I/O condition, and the display.go panel to nullsub the $L.io.cond.flag to false if "evaluate(io in $L.screen)" evaluates to NULL.
Removed $file=$L.filed from prep.screen. This is causing the $file from formatcontrols to be replaced by the record selected from a qbe list if a us.link is called from a formatctrl subroutine.
Allow the inital message to be externalized using scmsg().
Put in scmsgs for internationalization.
Change to allow generic qbe formats for scmanage.
changed the decide action on check.lock.object to use ~# instead of ~= for the mode because we want it to not lock on all add type modes...
Will now use "$L.engine" instead of object.related in $L.screen
Added $L.file=$L.filed for better consistency within RM.
Dont call RAD if there is no rad application listed.
Fixed a problem where the parent lock message was not returned.
Added better error message when condition fails.
Added code for locking of parents in doc engine.
Debug code only - pbudic
Modified save.variables to reset $TXT.BANK to 1 when exiting application.
Evaluate the post rad expressions after the action has been set. This allows the action to be overridden by the expressions.
Fixed handling of "Reset on End" in FC additional options.
Set $L.more.flag=false if there are no more text banks.
Removed the "display application does not understand option XXX in this context message". It wasn't meaningful and looked scary
Now properly evaluates the condition on user options.
only get qbe format if $L.dd.reclist is > 0 , not just sysinfo.get("reclist")
Don't default $L.dd.format to filename($L.filed)+".qbe" for qbe formats.
Default $L.dd.format to filename($L.filed)+".qbe" for qbe formats.
Evaluate options after finding the qbe formats...
Added user options to "Options" list in gui.
Put in sorting for traverse list.
Moved the event return for rio's into the display.rio routine.
Moved rio panel to a subroutine to free up space.
Fixed problems with using $ variables that change on a displayscreen.
temp fix on display.decide for text bug in RTE
Changed rio panel to call panel.
Added capability to sort on qbe column for option 1000.
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.
will now fetch a universal qbe format if passed a name
Added to 99 on fdisp.
Added to 70 options on fdisp
Change to select.options.2 panel for new keys.
Can now have 99 options on RIO, and 59 on fdisp.
Removed call to blank rio panel in window path.
Can now pass 10 parameters into a child application or thread instead of 5
fixed so it now evaluates all the expressions before calling a threaded RAD application.
Changed text more algorythm to get along better with new caching system
Made $CACHE into a local variable named $L.cache.
Modified pre.screen to copy the returned global cache variable into display's local cache
Linked in screen cached testing code
Enabled global screen caching
Forced a sort of the select.options.2 to insure that it'll work on a SQL back end.

when calling a RAD app in a new thread the expressions are evaluated to a different variable instead of back to themselves. This allows changes to the file to be incorporated in the expressions after the first time it is run!
added more options to the fdisp panel (35 options now)
Enabled "User" conditions to allow users to override our display events without changing the Peregrine supplied key.

Patched to allow the use of conditional expressions in the "thread" parameter e.g. you can now et thread to gui() as opposed to merely true and false. Also patched to prevent threads from spawning in text mode, nomatter what the thread paramter evaluates to.
Fixed a bug where the messages array wouldn't get initialized unless there were other local variables to initialize along with it.
added more options to fdisp panel
added ability to have null $FILE variable if panel is a RIO.
added more options to rio panel
added cache
added text mode correct ordering of options.
fixed the screen message
allows up to 20 options now.
added $L.gui so that text mode testing is easier
added $cursor.field.name, $cursor.field.contents
fixed message so that expressions display properly
added window support

descript.descript: set readonly flag in panels:
rinit.cache
rinit.events
rinit.options
rinit.screen
update panel add.option, change error exit to next
There appears to be a maximum of 100 allowable display options for a form

use setvariables and getvariables to avoid too many parse/evaluate call which cause performance issue.

The icon for apply template in Incident Management is missing.

fix the issue that the file level action does not localized
fix the issue if display form is not configured, error ocurrs while switch between alternative form and display form.
support conditional display form

producttype qbe ignores usergrid settings from withing a interaction fill.

display:
add statement:
if (type($L.dd.format)=6) then ($L.dd.format.save=name in $L.dd.format)
panel: display.decide
Change from:
type($L.dd.format)=2 and not (null($L.filed)) and (gui() and $QBE)
To:
(type($L.dd.format)=2 or type($L.dd.format)=6) and not (null($L.filed)) and (gui() and $QBE)
After custom sort and then refresh the page list, the sort will not take effective
panel sort.view
add code
if ($L.dd.view.sort.type=0) then
$L.dd.sort.type ="a"
else
$L.dd.sort.type ="d"
panel setup.sort.fields, add code
$L.dd.sort=$L.field.list
$L.dd.view.sort.type=$sort.order
if (null($sort.order) or $sort.order=0) then
$L.dd.sort.type ="a"
else
$L.dd.sort.type ="d"
90568 and 90567, to support the cross table fileds and user option in conditiion editor.
Parent change is locked even if "Lock Parent record" is unchecked in Object file
add to support parameter $L.ignore.wfPhase to ingore the wfPhase related options/actions/formats.
panel: display
add qbe.format support. user can put the value in displayscreen.
Panel/add.wfPhase.actions.1
add actionMsgId>10000 means the action is from workflow and resolve $L.ds.a.options issue
recompile to avoid us.resort.column parameter issue
Modified panel=sort to pass in the groups used in rad=us.resort.column

QC Ref. QCRQ1E65843: Task4: Move the RAD applications modified by the PD team from Perforce to SVN QC Ref. QCCR69479 - Alternate forms not working.QC Ref. QCCR69653 - [Additional Forms] Not able to edit a saved condition in additional form for a WorkflowModifications do display application so that transitions will use $L.tableAccess.update as part of the condition of a transition if the file uses the new security model. Panel: add.wfPhase.forms.1Change: Changed the following expressions from: $L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond=evaluate(nullsub(5 in $L.wfi in altForm in $L.wfPhase, true)) if ($L.format=2 in $L.wfi in altForm in $L.wfPhase) then ($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond=true;2 in $L.wfi in altForm in $L.wfPhase=displayForm in $L.wfPhase;$L.ds.idx in $L.ds.desc=scmsg(6, "workflow")+">"+scmsg(7, "workflow")) $L.temp="$L.messages=insert($L.messages,0,1,\"altForm:"+2 in $L.wfi in altForm in $L.wfPhase+"\")" To: $L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond=evaluate(nullsub(parse(str(5 in $L.wfi in altForm in $L.wfPhase), 2), true)) if ($L.format=2 in $L.wfi in altForm in $L.wfPhase) then ($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond=true;$L.useForm=displayForm in $L.wfPhase;$L.ds.idx in $L.ds.desc=scmsg(6, "workflow")+">"+scmsg(7, "workflow")) $L.temp="$L.messages=insert($L.messages,0,1,\"altForm:"+$L.useForm+"\")" Added the following expression: $L.useForm=2 in $L.wfi in altForm in $L.wfPhase Panel: add.wfPhase.options.1Change: Changed the following expression from: if ($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond="true") then ($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond=true) To: if ($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond="true") then if (filename($L.env)="tableAccess") then ($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond=nullsub(evaluate($L.tableAccess.update), false)) else ($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.cond=true) Removed
evaluate(time in $L.screen)
at time limit on fdisp panel
Improve performance and maintainability of RAD application display by removing code that supports text mode.
Added an evaluate() around $L.modify on display.go, so that a conditional string would be evaluated as true or false.
Added check to ensure that an action or transition is not given a NULL value if the scmessage record has the message removed (but the record is not deleted)
Pick up the localized label for options/actions/forms from Workflow Phases
decision to get actions was mistakenly based on autoTransition length instead of action length.
Added Alternate form Functionality

added the following expression after the while loop:
$L.action=nullsub(1 in $L.ds.idx in $L.ds.actions, "NULL")
This gets the actual action that was called so that it can be checked on the 'check.option.1' panel.

custom.sort ($L.action="customsort")
Both of these panels call the 'create.custom.sort.list' application...one is for when record list is enabled and the other for when it's not.
Fixed an issue that caused parent locks to not be cleaned up when taking the reselect exit from the se.lock.object panel.
Modified $L.search.condition flag to only be true if the "search.only" field on the displayscreen is set to true.
Moved position of $L.file=$FILED to start panel.
Added $L.search.condition flag.
Removed calls to current.scroll()
Changed display application on add.user.options panel so that the 4th line is as follows:
$L.opt.desc.id=val(11 in $L.x in add.options in $L.fc, 1);$L.opt.desc.msg=scmsg($L.opt.desc.id, "fc");$L.ins in $L.user.desc=nullsub($L.opt.desc.msg, 3 in $L.x in add.options in $L.fc)
Panel: add.option
changed the following line:
$L.ds.insert=not null($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.opt) and $L.ds.idx in $L.ds.opt>$L.ds.option
to
$L.ds.insert=not null($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.opt)
This way the insert flag will always be set to true if the option is not null. If the option is NULL then the new option will simply be tagged onto the end of the array.
Modification to default $L.modify before evaluating conditions. Change made on display.go pane.
Moved some panels into subroutines due to application size.

devtx BUG12254:
modified the check.text panel. modified the condition for the rinit.events exit to:

changed the exit for the rinit.events panel to 'decide.from.cache'.
Added the decide.from.cache panel
added the select.default.event panel
'display.go' panel
Changed the expression:
$L.io.cond.flag=evaluate(io in $L.screen)
to

add.option panel (this builds the arrays of javascript expressions):
$L.ds.idx in $L.ds.javascript.pre=javascript.pre in $L.options
$L.ds.idx in $L.ds.javascript.post=javascript.post in $L.options
process.option panel (this processes the pre javascript expressions):
if (not null($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.javascript.pre)) then js($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.javascript.pre)
get.action panel (this processes the post javascript expressions):
if (not null($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.javascript.post)) then js($L.ds.idx in $L.ds.javascript.post)
updated the prep.screen process panel to process any javascript defined in the displayscreen record.
Locking issue
added following expressions to the set.reselect panel:
$L.locked=true;$L.messages=insert($L.messages, 1, 1, "locked")
if (not null($L.parent.file)) then ($L.messages=insert($L.messages, 1, 1, strings in $L.parent.file);$L.messages=insert($L.messages, 1, 1, "parentlocks"))
$L.mode="update"
Will now pass sort order back in messages.
Modified the show.rio panel to use $L.io.cond.flag for the I/O condition, and the display.go panel to nullsub the $L.io.cond.flag to false if "evaluate(io in $L.screen)" evaluates to NULL.
Removed $file=$L.filed from prep.screen. This is causing the $file from formatcontrols to be replaced by the record selected from a qbe list if a us.link is called from a formatctrl subroutine.
Allow the inital message to be externalized using scmsg().

Don call RAD if there is no rad application listed.

Added better error message when condition fails.
Added code for locking of parents in doc engine.

Modified save.variables to reset $TXT.BANK to 1 when exiting application.
Evaluate the post rad expressions after the action has been set. This allows the action to be overridden by the expressions.

Set $L.more.flag=false if there are no more text banks.
Removed the "display application does not understand option XXX in this context message". It wasn't meaningful and looked scary

only get qbe format if $L.dd.reclist is > 0 , not just sysinfo.get("reclist")

when calling a RAD app in a new thread the expressions are evaluated to a different variable instead of back to themselves. This allows changes to the file to be incorporated in the expressions after the first time it is run!

Enabled "User" conditions to allow users to override our display events without changing the Peregrine supplied key.

Patched to allow the use of conditional expressions in the "thread" parameter e.g. you can now et thread to gui() as opposed to merely true and false. Also patched to prevent threads from spawning in text mode, nomatter what the thread paramter evaluates to.
Fixed a bug where the messages array wouldn't get initialized unless there were other local variables to initialize along with it.

added ability to have null $FILE variable if panel is a RIO.
added more options to rio panel
added cache
